p: All experiments were performed in technical duplicate and at least three were independent experiments. After an examination of quality criteria, non-parametrical methods were used for analysis. Statistical significances were evaluated by one-way-ANOVA (Kruskal–Wallis test) followed by Mann–Whitney U test or by using one-way-ANOVA Tukey’s multiple comparison test. Statistical analysis was performed using SPSS Statistics 25 software (IBM, Armonk, NY, USA) and Prism software (v.8; GraphPad Software, La Jolla, CA, USA).
